item.description:
SUMMER SOLSTICE HIKE



When: Sunday, June 22, 2:00 P.M


Where: Wadsworth Falls, Middletown CT


Meeting Location: The Cover Bridge, Depending On Weather



Open to all


including the curious, and Buddha Gaia friends & members


Free of Charge



Come and join us for a few hours of mindful steps in the tranquility of nature; pondering the diversity of white pine forests, roaring brooks, and song birds. Before we explore this wilderness, we?ll be meeting for lunch 12:30 P.M. at Thai Gardens on Main Street in Middletown, following our weekly Sangha gathering starting at 10:00 A.M. Call me if you have any questions, (860) 759-4975.


Some of you on MEET UP.COM are members you have NEVER attended a meeting. Why not? What are you waiting for? The ice caps to melt? Try to come to our meetings. DON'T BE AFRAID! We don't bite!

Visit our main web site at http://buddhistfaith....
item.how_to_find_us: 1st meeting at Thai Gardens for lunch @ 12:30 p.m. or just meet @ Wads.
item.why: make a positive difference in global warming, and other environmental and social issues. Also, this is a warm and friendly group. You'll like everybody. Lots of smiling and compassionate folks.
item.name: SUMMER SOLSTICE HIKE
